text: I'm having an issue with copying a date from my custom object to replace the Close date for Closed Won deals. It's a simple workflow to copy the date but is one day earlier than it's supposed to be. No one at support seems to know what the issue is and I'm told by them it's a bug. How can I get this fixed?
If the IF condition doesnt offer you the right options, you can do a custom code step if there is any way to match the objects
